tool_description: This API references multiple data sources to confirm an individual’s identity across over 60 data points of personally identifiable information (PII) and appends a fraud risk score.
title: ID Verify

api_list.name: /GetReport
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://id-verify.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "id-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

import requests

url = "https://id-verify.p.rapidapi.com/GetReport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "id-verify.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
